title: December 05, 2024 — Private Notebooks in a Personal Database — Preview | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: With this release, we are pleased to announce the preview of private notebooks in a personal database.

In Snowsight, you can create a private, user-owned notebook. This private notebook is stored in your personal database: a dedicated
workspace where you can create, modify, and manage your private notebooks.
For more information, see Private notebooks.
